title: VS - Kitakantou Renzoku Youjo Yuukai Satsujin Jiken no Shinjitsu
original_name: VS. -北関東連続幼女誘拐・殺人事件の真実-
sinopse: True story about one of the greatest miscarriages of justice, the case had Sugaya raises serious concerns about the functioning of justice in Japan. Back on the survey investigation.
